title: Mapun (1995) Genesis Portion
description: Mapun is an island municipality in the Sulu Sea on the south-western extreme of the Philippines, located very close to Sabah, Malaysia as well as to Palawan. The people inhabiting the island are known as Jama Mapun or "people of Mapun". Their local language is Pullun Mapun, which means "Mapun language".

language.name: Mapun
language.area: Cagayan de Sulu and Palawan islands. Also in Malaysia (Sabah).
